Citations.Cited_Guidance: The sponsor study role must point to exactly one organization.

rule.Check:
study.versions@$sv.
  ($sv.roles[code.code = "C70793"])@$r.
    {
      "instanceType": $r.instanceType,
      "id": $r.id,
      "path": $r._path,
      "name": $r.name,
      "code.code": $r.code.code,
      "code.decode": $r.code.decode,
      "organizationIds": $r.organizationIds[],
      "# Organizations": $count($sv.organizations[id in $r.organizationIds]),
      "Organization.id: name": 
        $r.organizationIds
        ? "["&$join($r.organizationIds.($oid:=$;$oid&": "&($o:=$sv.organizations[id=$oid];$o?$o.name:"Invalid organizationId")),"; ")&"]"
    }[$not($count(organizationIds) = 1 and `# Organizations` = 1)]
rule.Description: The sponsor study role must point to exactly one organization.

Outcome.Message: The study role is a sponsor role (code.code is C70793) but it does not point to exactly one organization - it does not have exactly one value for organizationIds that is a valid id value for an organization.
